org.sakaiproject.util.impl

Class FormattedTextImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.sakaiproject.util.impl.FormattedTextImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.sakaiproject.util.api.FormattedText

    public class FormattedTextImpl
extends Object
implements org.sakaiproject.util.api.FormattedText
    FormattedText provides support for user entry of formatted text; the formatted text is HTML. This includes text formatting in user input such as bold, underline, and fonts.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected static String ESCAPE_URL
      These characters are escaped when making a URL
      protected static String ESCAPE_URL_SPECIAL
      These can't be encoded in URLs safely even using %nn notation, so encode them using our own custom URL encoding
      Pattern M_patternAnchorTagWithOutTarget
      Matches all anchor tags that do not have a target attribute.
      Pattern M_patternAnchorTagWithTarget
      Matches all anchor tags that have a target attribute.
      boolean useLegacyCleaner
      If true then the legacy HTML cleaner is used, if false use the antiSamy html cleaner

      • toHex

        protected static final String toHex(byte b)
        Returns a hex representation of a byte.
        Parameters:
        b - The byte to convert to hex.
        Returns:
        The 2-digit hex value of the supplied byte.

      • hexDigit

        protected static final char hexDigit(int i)
        Returns the hex digit corresponding to a number between 0 and 15.
        Parameters:
        i - The number to get the hex digit for.
        Returns:
        The hex digit corresponding to that number.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - If supplied digit is not between 0 and 15 inclusive.
